snippet.title: Battle Shapers - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description: Battle Shapers is heading to Early Access for Windows PC in 2023. Watch the announcement trailer for a peek at this upcoming roguelite sci-fi first-person shooter game. In Battle Shapers, play as Ada, a spirited android who must rise to reclaim the future of her city, New Elysium, from cunning and sometimes obnoxious Overlords and their swarms of corrupt robots.
